roleset.name: speaking out against

role.descr: for what (if in addition to arg1)

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: I do n't see the need for the outcry against him for stating an opinion ; instead , just form an opinion .

example.name: Arg2
example.text: ... healing could begin with their outcry to a friend , family member , or an anonymous call to a hotline .

propbank.arg: to a friend , family member , or an anonymous call to a hotline

example.name: args 0, 1, ADJ
example.text: Where 's the public outcry about Russian veto and unilateralism -LRB- a criticism routinely employed - rightly - against the United States when it vetoes resolutions on Israeli aggression -RRB- ?

propbank.arg: -LRB- a criticism routinely employed - rightly - against the United States when it vetoes resolutions on Israeli aggression -RRB-

roleset.note: OUTCRY-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WordNet. No VNcls. (from outcry.01-n)
